message.raw:
Changed --verbose flag to --quiet
Made all modules verbose by default
Cleaned up all command-line interfaces (made metavars consistent, etc)
Cleaned up interface between python and R by adding r_call and r_plot functions
Cleaned up segtools-pickle-segmentation interface
